00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "TShapeSize3DB2.hpp"
00035 #include "TMPDerivs.hpp"
00036 
00037 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00038 
00039 std::string TShapeSize3DB2::get_name() const
00040   { return "TShapeSize3DB2"; }
00041 
00042 TShapeSize3DB2::~TShapeSize3DB2() {}
00043 
00044 bool TShapeSize3DB2::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00045                                double& result, 
00046                                MsqError&  )
00047 {
00048   const double tau = det(T);
00049   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00050     result = 0.0;
00051     return false;
00052   }
00053   
00054   const double f = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00055   const double g = sqr_Frobenius(adj(T));
00056   result = (f + g)/(6 * tau) - 1;
00057   return true;
00058 }
00059 
00060 bool TShapeSize3DB2::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00061                                          double& result,
00062                                          MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00063                                          MsqError& err )
00064 {
00065   const double tau = det(T);
00066   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00067     result = 0.0;
00068     return false;
00069   }
00070   
00071   const double f = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00072   const double g = sqr_Frobenius(adj(T));
00073   result = (f + g)/(6 * tau);
00074   
00075   deriv_wrt_T = -transpose(T) * T;
00076   deriv_wrt_T(0,0) += 1+f;
00077   deriv_wrt_T(1,1) += 1+f;
00078   deriv_wrt_T(2,2) += 1+f;
00079   deriv_wrt_T = T * deriv_wrt_T;
00080   deriv_wrt_T -= 3*result * transpose_adj(T);
00081   deriv_wrt_T *= 1.0/(3*tau);
00082   
00083   result -= 1.0;
00084   return true;
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 bool TShapeSize3DB2::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00089                                          double& result,
00090                                          MsqMatrix<3,3>& wrt_T,
00091                                          MsqMatrix<3,3> second[6],
00092                                          MsqError& err )
00093 {
00094   const double tau = det(T);
00095   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00096     result = 0.0;
00097     return false;
00098   }
00099   
00100   const double f = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00101   const double g = sqr_Frobenius(adj(T));
00102   result = (f + g)/(6 * tau);
00103   
00104   MsqMatrix<3,3> dtau = transpose_adj(T);
00105   MsqMatrix<3,3> dg = -transpose(T) * T;
00106   dg(0,0) += f;
00107   dg(1,1) += f;
00108   dg(2,2) += f;
00109   dg = T * dg;
00110   dg *= 2;
00111   
00112   wrt_T = T;
00113   wrt_T += 0.5*dg;
00114   wrt_T *= 1.0/3.0;
00115   wrt_T -= result * dtau;
00116   wrt_T *= 1.0/tau;
00117   
00118   set_scaled_2nd_deriv_norm_sqr_adj( second, 1.0/6.0, T );
00119   pluseq_scaled_I( second, 1.0/3.0 );
00120   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, -1./3./tau, T, dtau );
00121   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, -1./6./tau, dg, dtau );
00122   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second, 2*result/tau, dtau );
00123   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second, -result, T );
00124   hess_scale( second, 1.0/tau );
00125   
00126   result -= 1.0;
00127   return true;
00128 }
